no_disabled_commands: No commands are disabled for this server.
cannot_disable_guildconfig: Cannot disable guildconfig command, as it is required for managing the guild configuration.
reset_language: Language reset to default, which is `American English (en-US)`
list_prefix: The prefix for this server is {{prefix}}
invalid_prefix: Invalid prefix. Prefix must be more than single character
reset_prefix: Prefix reset to default, which is `imperia!`
default: View what settings can be configured via the slash command, and what the current values are. Message commands follow the same format as slash commands in a 1:1 manner. For example, `{{prefix}}guildconfig prefix list` is identical to `/guildconfig prefix list`
reset: Resetting all guild configuration settings to default values.
